page.title: 15LIFE STYLES
page.content: The Huntly Haggis is a cafe.They get 100 to 150 customers a day.Steak is the favorite meal.The Castle Hotel has a variety of meals and rooms.It also has sporting activities available. Discos are held in the Linden centre and the school.The favourite pop group in our class is New Model Army.The favourite male singer is Stuart Adamson.The favourite female singer is Maddona. Creams,perfume,jewelery,make-up, nailvarnish,hair accessories ect are sold in Square Deal a toiletries shop. Hair is usually worn with short sides and long and flicked at the front or permed.Two shops sell fashion,jewllery :Square Deal and Denim Plus. They sell necklaces, rings,earings and bangles.Demin Plus sells fashion clothes,bags and shoes.Dungarees,tight skirts and flat shoes are fashionable.
